about_the_game:
🩸 Gore Mode Unleashed:
For those seeking a more visceral and intense gameplay experience, activate the Gore Mode to turn your Happy Lab into a laboratory of carnage! Watch as your experiments take a dark turn, with more realistic and dynamic blood effects. From explosive reactions to gooey splatters, every experiment becomes a spectacle of scientific mayhem. Customize the level of gore to suit your taste, making every experiment an adrenaline-pumping adventure.

🌪️ Unlimited Money Free Mode:
Embark on the ultimate scientific journey without financial constraints in the Unlimited Money Free Mode! Enjoy the freedom to experiment without worrying about budgets or resource limitations. Build the lab of your dreams, create the most extravagant contraptions, and push the boundaries of scientific exploration. Whether you're constructing towering structures or experimenting with outrageous combinations, the possibilities are limitless. Unleash your creativity and let your wildest scientific fantasies come to life!

👿 Key Features:

Gore Mode: Turn on the gore for a more realistic and intense gaming experience.
Dynamic Blood Effects: Witness realistic blood splatters and explosive reactions as you conduct experiments.
Unlimited Money Free Mode: Remove financial constraints and experiment freely with unlimited resources.
Creative Freedom: Build the lab of your dreams and push the boundaries of scientific exploration without limitations.

Unleash chaos, push the boundaries of science, and redefine the meaning of experimentation in Happy Lab with the "Carnage Chronicles" DLC. Are you ready to embrace the madness? The laboratory awaits your scientific prowess!

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC adds options to change oil to blood. Why you wanna do it - it is up to you.
